korean: 요즘 잠을 제대로 못 자서 하루 종일 피곤하다.
밤에 누우면 잠이 안 와서 휴대폰만 보게 돼.
커피를 너무 많이 마신 것 같기도 하다.
english: I haven't been sleeping properly lately, so I'm tired all day.
When I lie down at night, I can't fall asleep and just end up looking at my phone.
I think I might have had too much coffee.
I promised myself to go to bed early tonight.
